meanings.definition: A type of mushroom with brightly colored caps.
meanings.sent1: The russula mushroom grew in the damp forest.
meanings.sent2: I picked a russula for my nature collection.
meanings.sent3: The russula wore a tiny hat made of leaves.
meanings.sent4: The russula stood out like a colorful umbrella in the woods.
meanings.sent5: The russula's cap was as vibrant as a rainbow.

meanings.definition: The genus of fungi to which the russula belongs.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study the russula genus to learn more about mushrooms.
meanings.sent2: The russula genus includes many different species.
meanings.sent3: The russula genus had a family reunion in the forest.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fungi, the russula genus is like a big family.
meanings.sent5: Each member of the russula genus has its own unique characteristics.
